name: adapters
description: E2E test site for testing official adapters
author: LekoArts

scripts.build:debug: cross-env USE_DEBUG_ADAPTER=y CYPRESS_SUPPORT=y npm run build
scripts.develop:debug: start-server-and-test develop http://localhost:8000 'npm run cy:open -- --config baseUrl=http://localhost:8000'
scripts.test:template: cross-env-shell CYPRESS_GROUP_NAME=$ADAPTER TRAILING_SLASH=$TRAILING_SLASH node ../../scripts/cypress-run-with-conditional-record-flag.js --browser chrome --e2e --config-file "cypress/configs/$ADAPTER.ts" --env TRAILING_SLASH=$TRAILING_SLASH
scripts.test:template:debug: cross-env-shell CYPRESS_GROUP_NAME=$ADAPTER TRAILING_SLASH=$TRAILING_SLASH npm run cy:open -- --config-file "cypress/configs/$ADAPTER.ts" --env TRAILING_SLASH=$TRAILING_SLASH
scripts.test:fastify: start-server-and-test 'cross-env TRAILING_SLASH=always BROWSER=none gserve' http://localhost:8080 'cross-env ADAPTER=fastify TRAILING_SLASH=always npm run test:template'
scripts.test:fastify:debug: start-server-and-test 'cross-env TRAILING_SLASH=always BROWSER=none gserve' http://localhost:8080 'cross-env ADAPTER=fastify TRAILING_SLASH=always npm run test:template:debug'
